p:
To a lesser extent, local cases of DENV were also reported in Europe; in 2010, autochthonous transmission was related in Southern France
10 and Croatia
8 . Since then, several transmission episodes were periodically detected in Europe
41 . It has been demonstrated that Ae. albopictus in France were able to transmit DENV-1 from day 9 post infectious blood meal
35 . Mosquito populations tested in this study showed moderate infection, and low dissemination and transmission efficiencies. As for CHIKV, it has been shown that the environmental temperature can increase transmission of DENV
42, 43 . The risk of dengue outbreaks is still a threat to Europe and recalls the past when dengue caused ~1 million cases in Athens, Greece, in 1927â€“1928
44 .
